name: Scrambled Eggs with Toast
description: Two fluffy scrambled eggs served with your choice of toast (white, wheat, or sourdough)

name: Pancakes with Fruit and Maple Syrup
description: Three fluffy pancakes topped with fresh seasonal fruit and drizzled with maple syrup

name: French Toast with Berries and Whipped Cream
description: Thick slices of French toast drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries and whipped cream

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: Scrambled eggs, sausage, cheese, and salsa wrapped in a warm tortilla

name: Breakfast Sandwich
description: Your choice of egg (scrambled, fried, or omelet), cheese, and bacon or sausage on a toasted bagel or English muffin

name: Oatmeal with Fruit and Nuts
description: Steel-cut oats topped with fresh fruit and nuts, served with a drizzle of honey or maple syrup

name: Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered yogurt with granola, fresh fruit, and honey

name: Avocado Toast
description: Smashed avocado on toasted bread, topped with your choice of toppings (e.g., feta cheese, tomatoes, chili flakes)

name: Fruit Plate
description: A selection of seasonal fresh fruits

name: Granola and Milk
description: Crunchy granola served with your choice of milk (dairy or non-dairy)

name: Breakfast Quesadilla
description: Scrambled eggs, cheese, and your choice of other fillings (bacon, sausage, vegetables) wrapped in a warm tortilla
